faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What documents and approvals do I need to set up a bank account?
items.answer: Generally, you’ll need a trade name, incorporation documents, a trade license, shareholder information, and proof of identity.

items.question: How long does it take to open a corporate bank account in the UAE?
items.answer: The timeline for a UAE corporate bank acount can vary depending on your jurisdiction, industry, and business activity. Our expert business consultants can help you open a fully operational account within days.

items.question: How does treasury management benefit my UAE-based business?
items.answer: Our strategic treasury management solutions empower you to optimise liquidity, make smarter investments, and reduce financial risks to help you scale across borders and maximise cash flow.

items.question: How can I make my wealth work harder without taking unnecessary risks?
items.answer: Our seasoned wealth management consultants empower you with tailored strategies to maximise growth, optimise liquidity, and secure your assets. By aligning investments with your goals and risk profile, our experts help you grow your wealth confidently.

items.question: Do I retain full control of my UAE-based business if I get corporate bank account assistance?
items.answer: Yes, nominee shareholders and directors have no decision-making power or access to funds, so you maintain 100% ownership of your business.
